author: timbeiko
content: <@155753175494688768> the main constraint for more devnets isn't money as much as core dev + devops/testing time

author: timbeiko
content: I'm not sure it makes much sense to prototype rejected EIPs (many EIPs actually get rejected after being prototyped!), but I would personally support "high performance" testnets that push the block size or other parameters. One challenge with these is you need to make sure you are actually pushing things along their main bottleneck.
